key_features: Up to 25X UNI$ for every S$5 spend (equiv. to 10 miles per S$1) on up to 2 of your preferred rewards category(ies) with no minimum spend required.
Choose from Beauty & Wellness, Dining, Entertainment, Family, Fashion, Transport and Travel.
10X UNI$ (4 miles per S$1) with no min. spend + additional up to 15X UNI$ (6 miles per S$1) when you save with UOB Lady's Savings Account
Flexibility to change your Preferred Rewards Category(ies) Spending every quarter.
UOB Lady's LuxePay Plan 6 or 12-month installment plan with no interest or processing fees
Free e-Commerce protection for online purchases up to USD$200
Earn up to 6.0% p.a. interest with UOB One Account
air_miles: Up to 25X UNI$ per S$5 spent (equivalent to 10 miles per S$1) on your selected category(ies), valid for online, in-store, local and overseas spend
No min. spend, Bonus 9X UNI$ and up to 15X Lady's Savings Bonus UNI$ is capped at S$2,000 spend per calendar month for UOB Lady's Solitaire Card.
Convert your UNI$ into air miles at the conversion rate of UNI$1 = 2 miles
overseas_spending: Up to 25X UNI$ per S$5 spent (equivalent to 10 miles per S$1) on your selected category(ies), valid for online, in-store, local and overseas spend
No min. spend, Bonus 9X UNI$ and up to 15X Lady's Savings Bonus UNI$ is capped at S$2,000 spend per calendar month for UOB Lady's Solitaire Card.
Valid for online, in-stores, local and overseas spend
petrol: Up to 25X UNI$ per S$5 spent (equivalent to 10 miles per S$1) on Petrol with no min. spend required
Flexibility to change your category(ies) every quarter
Valid for online, in-stores, local and overseas spend
rewards: Base earn rate: UNI$1 per S$5 spent (equivalent to 0.4 miles per S$1)
UNI$1 per S$5 spent (equivalent to 0.4 miles per S$1) on all purchases

Select up to 2 rewards category(ies) to earn Bonus 9X UNI$ for every S$5 spent (equivalent to 3.6 miles per S$1). Additional up to 15X UNI$ (6 miles per S$1) when you save with UOB Lady's Savings Account
No min. spend, Bonus 9X UNI$ and up to 15X Lady's Savings Bonus UNI$ is capped at S$2,000 spend per calendar month for UOB Lady's Solitaire Card.
Convert your UNI$ into air miles at the conversion rate of UNI$1 = 2 miles

Feel free to change your preferred rewards category(ies) as your lifestyle and interest evolves, any change will only take effect from the next calendar quarter.

UOB UNI$ Rewards points terms and conditions: General exclusions such as payments via AXS, EZ Link, PayPal, YouTrip, and bill payments, instalment plans, cash advance, payments to property, insurance, financial, educational, and governmental transactions will not qualify for UNI$ rewards points
